about_the_game:
It's your first time holding a real job. Like a real-deal job with a lot of responsibilities. You're an executive assistant aboard the U.S.S. Tibarn, the biggest airship in the world. It's embarking on its maiden voyage, a cruise around the world, and you're embarking on a not-so-maiden voyage of your own.

Okay, so actually you're more like an underpaid janitor, but you still get to be on a luxury cruise in the sky, right?

Whether it's helping clean the infinity pool, or lazing around after hours at the local lesbian bar, you're going to have the time of your life on the Tibarn. And, if you're lucky, you'll snag a girlfriend, too.

Do your best. There's a ton of choices. Some tricky decisions. And a whole lotta paths the story can take.

  • A 50,000+ word story--5+ hours of gameplay.

  • Lots of choices with over 15 endings.

  • A treasure trove of art, backgrounds, and CGs.

  • A goofy fantasy world.

  • An unceasingly quirky protagonist.

Yuri Kissaten is a new game studio dedicated to making games about girls who love girls. This is our first release!

The main minds behind this game are:

  • Bea Baker, the creator of popular internet books like The Gay Gatsby and Hands Held in the Snow.

  • Fruz, webcomic artist, video editor, and world-renowned Among Us fan artist.

  • linguisticspaceship, programmer galore.

We hope you enjoy all our very gay games!

content_descriptors.notes: Mild foul language; innuendo, suggestive themes, discussion of sexual topics; use of alcohol/tobacco; violence shown and implied.

It's your first time holding a real job. Like a real-deal job with a lot of responsibilities. You're an executive assistant aboard the U.S.S. Tibarn, the biggest airship in the world. It's embarking on its maiden voyage, a cruise around the world, and you're embarking on a not-so-maiden voyage of your own.

Okay, so actually you're more like an underpaid janitor, but you still get to be on a luxury cruise in the sky, right?

Whether it's helping clean the infinity pool, or lazing around after hours at the local lesbian bar, you're going to have the time of your life on the Tibarn. And, if you're lucky, you'll snag a girlfriend, too.

Do your best. There's a ton of choices. Some tricky decisions. And a whole lotta paths the story can take.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.5
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In this wacky yuri dating sim, come aboard a magical airship cruise and experience romance, hijinks, and a crazy story with over 15 endings! Lots of choices and lots of really cute girls to date.
